# HIDDeviceManager.Notification

**Enumeration**

Notifications for HID devices.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Notification
```

## Overview

You can receive these notifications using [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceManager/monitorNotifications(matchingCriteria:)].

## Enumeration Cases

- **HIDDeviceManager.Notification.deviceMatched(_:)**: A notification that a device matched the device criteria.
- **HIDDeviceManager.Notification.deviceRemoved(_:)**: A notification that a previously matched device was removed from the system.

## Monitor device notifications

- **monitorNotifications(matchingCriteria:)**: Creates an asynchronous stream that receives notifications for devices of interest.
